remarks: Subspace sum is a subset of subspace join.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
djhsumss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhsumss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhsumss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhsumss.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
djhsumss.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhsumss.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhsumss.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
djhsumss.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) $.
djhsumss $p |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) Y ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) $.
